pages.text: Extremely punishing if the opponent doesn't have any $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/energy_overloader)Energy Overloaders/$, but try not to lose it early on..
Shield a ship with a 2 HP shield, has 3 uses.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: Only activates if you've used the active ability at least once. When destroyed, give all opponent ships a 1 HP shield.
pages.title: Passive Ability
